divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were vacationing in new hampshire and not familiar with the geography of the area. we were walking on the golf course at the steele hills resort in late afternoon. the golf course is at the rear of the resort and overlooks a wooded area sloping down a hill to a lake. on the other side is another hill (mountain?) that is wooded. i was taking photographs. a fog began to roll in limiting visibility. i could see only the outline of the landscape in front of me. suddenly two large round light balls appeared and hovered over what seemed to me to be the body of water. i was alarmed. i began snapping still photographs and then realized i had video capability. then i changed the setting to video. the video clips are short; however they are video. i had an eerie feeling and immediately told my husband that they were ���ufos.��� a man walked up to us and asked if i was videoing ���them.��� i told him i was. we walked over to the lodge restaurant where we were seated for dinner. we were seated in front of a large multi-story window that spanned the entire back of the restaurant and gave us an excellent view of the same scene we had been watching. seated next to us were four ladies who commented that they had been watching the ���ufos.��� i then asked the manager if he had seen it before as they were still plainly visible in the same spot as before. he said that he never had seen them. i then took video clips of them. when the video clips were downloaded to my computer i noted that they were shakey (i was shakey too!). these were made through the window. the others were made outside. one video shows the two balls still hovering and pulsating vibrant colors. another brief ball of light swiftly appears like a comet rushing directly to them and immediately disappears. one of these video clips shows an outline of two faint balls directly behind the two bright ones. the ufos then disappear. the still photos i made of this event first show one snake-like white light. the next ones shows two curved narrow white light rods. i���m definitely no professional photographer and cannot say if the camera and\or me are responsible for the rod appearance and was so agitated i cannot really remember what they looked like. i continued to have an erie feeling and did not want to be outside the condo. this event has been on my mind since that evening. i don���t have the technical expertise to analyze everything and determine if what i saw was ufo���s. my gut feeling is that they were.
Summary: Saw two bright round balls of light hovering over lake from the golf course and restaurant, Steele Hills Resort, Sanborton, NH.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sanbornton
There were no other sightings in Sanbornton on or around October 22nd 2009
